path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Coinfabrik/Flixxo Token Sale Security Audit - CoinFabrik Blog.pdf

findings.title: Worrying minting privileges
findings.description: The mechanism to create new tokens in Minted.sol allows whitelisted addresses to create new tokens long after the token sale is over, potentially leading to exploitation by an attacker.

findings.title: Move check before formula
findings.description: The finding suggests moving a check before a formula to prevent potential issues.
